lines.text: I'm not going to pretend it hasn't. Yeah, my--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She knew you were in need.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll need to fix this, but--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take your word for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to pull out my brush from my haversack and start fixing Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, now that we know that-- (groaning)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that information that we want to act on now? Or we should leave, go get allies, and come back and set up camp there and wait for them to arrive, and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So we'll know when they enter.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think it lasts that long.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've never made a ward before.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have a bunch of bombs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We should have picked one. Oh no!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What did it see before it died? What did the bunny see? What was so terrible to it that it couldn't live? (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did we just skip ourselves a trip back to the Empire?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just don't look; that's what the rest of us do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It just has a very cartoony shape.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So we should try to have as many convos as we can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we can kill three birds with one stone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Trying to get to Halas is a very unpredictable gambit, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that would be a thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But he is also technically the only living person that we know-- "living"-- from that time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could go in the ball and come out--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lucien will have already brought the city back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it could be over if we go into the ball.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Time passes too quick, it's over.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just Planet of the Apes at that point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know, it had that ability to change the passage of time within it, so maybe he knows how to fix it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We would be asking him questions, anyway, so we could ask about that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yussa wasn't interested in getting involved in any type of politics or the war.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think he might like it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's the best feeling I have.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we scry on Lucien, or one of them?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I mean, what do you want to know?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just want us to look at Zoran, or see if we're able to watch someone else besides Lucien who's good at shooting the eye out of the sky.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do you want to know if they're doing, though?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are they all together? That sort of stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you going to ask the Wild Mother again? Oh, right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, got some yes or no questions I can--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, I could do that, too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're on the VIP list today.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I kind of want to Scry before I do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My worry about scrying is if we get that close, they can look back and know where we are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So if I get far enough away from all of you then they won't be able to see anything but snow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I don't even think they're coming here, they're going to the spot you found.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's at least a hundred highly-trained people surrounding us right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you set up your Scry ritual, finalize your glyphs, and who's your target?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, give me just a second.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: ♪ (dial tones) ♪ We're sorry, your scry cannot be completed as dialed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please check your runes and try again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no snow, but you hear the sound, the crunch of footfalls on snow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it, I should have Guided myself before we did this! Every time!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She talks to herself a lot when she does this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, in the blurred space around you can see other figures walking around Zoran,

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see him walking in snow and you see a dark shape to the right hand side that is some sort of shift in topography, but that's all you can make out in the space.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't hear anybody talking? Why would they be talking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Based on the position of the light in the sky, because it is a clear sky today because of the roll that was made earlier, that does mean--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not like you can see a particular Bag of Holding on his hip or anything, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 21? Oh, this is a survival check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You gather they're traveling in a western to northwest direction, based on the placement of the light, and surmising where you last saw them and that dark shape, that might be the mountain range that you guys were at, which makes you think they're traveling away from Aeor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Arty, who he's talking to on the Menagerie Coast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I went back to my conversation."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I just show you the way."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't see anything, it's snowy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) He pulls you back into yourself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're heading away from us, I think.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It felt like they were going I don't know, like north, northwest based on where the sun was? Did I say that right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know where the other ruins are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe they know ruins that we don't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe. They should have been heading south or southeast.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do we want to ask?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wasn't there another ruin, though, that was on that northwest side?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Could there have been more than one threshold crest there?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did we go to the question mark one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We didn't. That's the far eastern.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We assume they had A5 and we got A2.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, it's good to know that they're not coming here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's only been a handful of hours since you saw them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They might just be walking around--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Tomb Takers, are they heading to find another threshold crest in a ruin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The cold temperature shifts into a warm, if stale, air. Confirming, though still with the apprehension of the dangers that this direction eventually holds.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would you be able to tell me if they had acquired one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The temperature doesn't change, remains warm, though still stale.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are they headed towards a ruin that we do not know of?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'll know when they've found one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It has been a number of nights since we had a (clicks) super chill, stress-free rest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know a good place to get one in Nicodranas.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Time is definitely of the essence.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The safe way to travel would be with a circle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure, we could sleep there tonight instead of in this frigid dump.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we tell Essek we're leaving? Tell him where the entrance is?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there someone we can leave word with?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would keep the circle close.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you left it behind when you were--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's actually a good idea, let's let Dagen know what we're doing and where we're going so that if there are questions, he can answer them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As for Essek, it seems like the faster we got out of Dodge, the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, he was pretty on edge.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If anyone asks, we've left word, but we don't have to bother anybody with it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You think anyone at this outpost has a map of the ruins before we bounce?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're not going to give it to us without Essek turning it over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got the sense that the map to the ruins goes with Essek, in the sense of they're not just going to give a copy of all their work to a central agent.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel comfortable knowing what I know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I think we just go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So that we make a good impression with Yussa, would you like to send word?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Definitely. I'll send a message to his assistant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Equal note taker, just of a different kind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But yes, you can send a note to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll let the master know right away." That's it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Got to use the whole spell, can't waste.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're sharing a drink in one of the smaller mess areas, as he turns over to the rest of you before you leave and just goes, "Well, what you all up to? Anything in particular?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we'll cross paths again, but we've got to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, well. take care of yourselves."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Think you're going to stick around here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And well, to be honest, I'm kind of okay without running into giant ancient white dragons."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're just kind of a beacon of danger."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you're still here in, like, a week, we could probably use you again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Will say, danger or not, y'all been at least a fun batch to be following."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dagen, I have an interesting, sort of personal question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I have probably a very disappointing, slightly watered down answer."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Move to some small town on the beach somewhere, be comfortable the rest of your days.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You ever been to Shamal Bay?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that in-- Do I know where that is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's got some real good sunlight."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, it ain't cheap, but I got a plan."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good for you, man. Good for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You don't got to shit me, you're young, you got plenty of time to figure it out." (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks, Dagen, for all your help.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Slip him really quickly the last of the hot cocoa balls, give him a pat. It's good to make friends. Stay safe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I give him a kiss on the cheek.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Get outta here." (laughter) Gives you a nod, and takes one of the cocoa balls.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would actually, if you got-- or whiskey, anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We just left him with another problem.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know if it's all ice, or if there's anything else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's easy enough to find the stone from any of the nearby structures built within, yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to wrap it in parchment and label it as this outpost, and then why don't we go back to our quarters, where I can draw on the ground in privacy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will draw the circle for Yussa's tower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you've you've traversed across Eiselcross, survived an encounter with--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the dragon, with the first real encounter with the Tomb Takers and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we roll hit points now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's go ahead and roll hit points now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll have to have figure out which one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I rolled a two, but that gets me, with my con modifier, just to 101 hit points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So when we roll it, we just add it to this roll, the HP number that's on here already?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, just the number you roll, it should add your constitution modifier automatically.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do we get at level 14? What does a cleric get? It's just more spell slots, if I recall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think so? I don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's plus your con, right? Plus your con?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just put the die number in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. So what's your total there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's that put you at, Yasha?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's just do your rolls, and let me know what your final HP total is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got to figure out which one I want to level up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought we got another spell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I could do an eight and a 10, let you know which one it is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, I can learn a new spell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would be five if I do a warlock, and eight if I do a paladin level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gotcha, okay. I have that marked here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, well, we'll go ahead and update that next time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, is this-- is this, wait.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll let these nice folks go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, they need to watch us choose our spells and abilities.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sit here for the next 40 minutes, deciding on--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's better? Major Image, or Magic Circle? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And is it Thursday yet? Good night.
